text:
@tedcruz Seriously Senator?
An unarmed black man was brutality murdered in broad daylight
The nation is calling for police reform
Over 100,000 people are dead from Covid-19
There's no vaccine
The US is in a recession
And Chris Cuomo' backside is newsworthy?
Priorities Senator. Priorities.
